body_html: FYI, you can use assertExpected instead of hard coding the strings, and then pass --accept to automatically accept the actual string as the expected result. Saves a bunch of copy pasting.
body_text: FYI, you can use assertExpected instead of hard coding the strings, and then pass --accept to automatically accept the actual string as the expected result. Saves a bunch of copy pasting.
body: FYI, you can use `assertExpected` instead of hard coding the strings, and then pass `--accept` to automatically accept the actual string as the expected result. Saves a bunch of copy pasting.
